Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##super() set proxy.athlete = ..Athlete.ConvertToProxyObject()
quit proxy

Method.name: Create
Method.Implementation:
if ..CmpAtUDSRIdxExists(competition.%Id(), athlete.id) { set obj = ..CmpAtUDSRIdxOpen(competition.%Id(), athlete.id) set obj.IsActive = 1 set st = obj.%Save() quit obj }
set obj = ..%New() set obj.Recorder = recorder set obj.Athlete = ##class(PersonUDSR).%OpenId(athlete.id) set obj.Competition = competition set st = obj.%Save() quit obj
